datadir._description: Data directory containing images. The CIFAR-10 and CIFAR-100 are labeled subsets of the 80 million tiny images dataset. They were collected by Alex Krizhevsky, Vinod Nair, and Geoffrey Hinton. In order to use this function, please visit the official website https://www.cs.toronto.edu/~kriz/cifar.html and download and untar python version of the data: https://www.cs.toronto.edu/~kriz/cifar-10-python.tar.gz and https://www.cs.toronto.edu/~kriz/cifar-100-python.tar.gz.

fine_labels._description: If True, this function use fine labels(100 classes). Otherwise, this function uses coarse labels(20 classes, super category).
